title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai’s Akshaya Naik takes on body-shamers | tv | Hindustan Times
text:
Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai’s Akshaya Naik takes on body-shamers tv Updated: Feb 14, 2017 11:59 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Akshaya plays Ananya in yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai. (Photo: Star Plus) 
Akshaya Naik, who plays Ananya in popular TV show Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, is fed up of trolls and body-shamers. In a message posted on her Instagram account, Akshaya has called out people who force women to look “perfect”. Read more See: Shah Rukh Khan and AbRam go for a late night walk at Juhu beach 
Naik writes, “We, as women, need to get out of this entire nutshell of being perfect. Unfortunately, perfection has always been portrayed as fair, slim, wearing fully covering clothes, well mannered and obedient. Well, we need to overcome this.” 
“You have given me more courage to accept myself and love my body. Be the queens of your life and let no one conquer you,” she adds. A post shared by Mumbai Chi Mulgi (@naik_akshaya) on Feb 11, 2017 at 9:13am PST 
She is not the first one to give it back to body-shamers. Sonakshi Sinha and Parineeti Chopra have also been vocal about such issues in the past. tags
